title: Richard Clarke is a smart dude
body: <p><a href="http://travis.pettijohn.com/blog/" title="no, not me, another travis">Travis</a> has a nice write-up of <a href="http://travis.pettijohn.com/blog/comments.php?entry=254" title="Richard Clarke at UIUC">Richard Clarke's speech at UIUC</a>. He makes many great points. I'd <a href="http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/redirect?path=search-handle-url/index%3Dbooks%26field-keywords%3Dagainst%20all%20enemies%20richard%20clarke&amp;tag=dieselhome-20" title="Amazon search for: against all enemies richard clarke">buy his book</a>, but my blood pressure is high enough.</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2005-03-09

Richard Clarke is a smart dude
